@graph.name: Monocle3 workflow
@graph.description:
Trajectory analysis using Monocle3, starting from 3 input files: expression matrix, gene and cell annotations

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Inferring single cell trajectories with Monocle3](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-case_monocle3-trajectories/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
